original_text: So Joshua took his whole army and they marched up from Gilgal. He had all his best soldiers with him.
korean_text: 여호수아가 모든 군사와 용사와 더불어 길갈에서 올라가니라

sentences.original_text: So Joshua took his whole army
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 여호수아는 그의 모든 군대를 이끌었고

sentences.original_text: and they marched up from Gilgal
He had all his best soldiers with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그와 함께 모든 최고의 군사들을 거느리고 있었습니다
